item.title: Black Thorn
item.description: Black Thorn is a dungeon in Oakland California rentable for private events or filming. They also hold educational events online. Black Thorn also operates [[notes/Sacred Muse|Sacred Muse]] in a space close by.

item.title: Cat Club
item.description: Cat Club is a bar in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]] that hosts [[notes/PlayXLand|PlayXLand]] every Wednesday night. The venue has a front and back room, each with its own bar, DJ booth, and dance floor.

item.title: ELSE
item.description: ELSE is an 18+ educational, support, and social kink space for adults who identify as non-cis, including trans, intersex, third gender, agender, two-spirit, & nonbinary folx.

item.title: erobay.com
item.description: erobay.com is (according to themselves) “the main BDSM calendar serving the Bay Area. If you look here you will see most of the classes, munches, parties, and other events taking place.

item.title: Fetlife
item.description: Fetlife is a social network for people in the BDSM community. Many people in the San Francisco scene use it to meet others, discuss BDSM, and find events they’re interested in.

item.title: Folsom St Fair
item.description: Folsom St Fair is the largest BDSM event in the world. It takes place on the last Sunday of September each year in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]].

item.title: Leather Alley
item.description: Leather Alley is an area of the San Francisco Pride celebration where there are BDSM demos, performances, and venues.

item.title: Leather Subculture
item.description: todo

item.title: Naked Mondays
item.description: Naked Mondays is a weekly play party for gay men at [[notes/Transform 1060|Transform 1060]].

item.title: PlayXLand
item.description: PlayXLand (pronounced “playland”) is a BDSM event that occurs every Wednesday night at [[notes/Cat Club|Cat Club]]. Aside from being a normal bar serving alcohol with DJs, there is a limited play space in the back room where there are one or more sawhorse-style spanking benches, a St.

item.title: Power Exchange
item.description: Power Exchange is a sex club in the Tenderloin neighborhood of San Francisco. It is not a BDSM-focused space, although BDSM is allowed there.

item.title: Release
item.description: Release is an open play party that happens monthly at [[notes/Transform 1060|Transform 1060]]. Links Transform 1060 Event Calendar

item.title: Sacred Muse
item.description: Sacred Muse is a dungeon in Oakland California rentable for private events or filming. It is operated by [[notes/Black Thorn|Black Thorn]].

item.title: Society of Janus
item.description: From their own website The Society of Janus is a San Francisco-based support and education organization for people interested in the kink, fetish, and BDSM lifestyles.

item.title: South of Market
item.description: San Francisco’s South of Market (SoMa) neighborhood is home to many BDSM venues and retailers. It is the yearly site of [[notes/Folsom St Fair|Folsom St Fair]], the [[notes/Up Your Alley|Up Your Alley]] fair, and much of the history of the [[notes/Leather Subculture|Leather Subculture]] can be traced back to SoMa.

item.title: The Exiles
item.description: The Exiles is a women & queer-centered BDSM organization. They host monthly virtual munches via Zoom. Links Main Website Linktree Instagram

item.title: Transform 1060
item.description: Transform 1060 is a BDSM dungeon in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]]. It is rentable for private events, and they host their own events.

item.title: Twisted Windows
item.description: Twisted Windows is a production company that hosts BDSM performances and play events. Some of their events are freestanding, and some are single stages within larger events, such as [[notes/Folsom St Fair|Folsom St Fair]] and [[notes/Leather Alley|Leather Alley]].

item.title: Up Your Alley
item.description: Up Your Alley, also known as “Dore Alley” is a yearly BDSM street fair in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]]. It happens on the last Sunday of July every year.

item.title: Vox Body Studio
item.description: Vox Body Studio is a rope bondage studio in Oakland California. They regularly host rope bondage educational classes and performance events.

item.title: Wicked Grounds
item.description: Wicked Grounds is a kink retailer and educational event host for the BDSM community. Cafe Wicked Grounds previously operated a kink-friendly coffee shop.
